text: The Kapampangan people, (Kapampangan: "mga Pampange√±o) are the Kapampangan speakers located at Central Luzon in the Philippines, it is majority in Pampanga and the provinces of Tarlac, Bataan and eastern portion of Zambales, The Kapampangan people are among in the Northern Philippine hilitribal groups including Ilocano people, Pangasinan people and Igorot people.https://dbpedia.org/page/Kapampangan_people Aside Tagalog people are native in some parts of Calabarzon and Metro Manila used the Tagalog language fluently.https://triplydb.com/esrabek/iris/browser?resource=http%3A%2F%2Fdbpedia.org%2Fresource%2FKapampangan_people ==Reference== Category:Ethnic groups in the Philippines
title: Kapampangan people
